prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon with a serpentine body and gray stone-like features.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a giant snake made of rocks and has a fierce gaze.
Generate an image of a Pokemon that appears to be a massive, twisting rock creature.
Make a serpentine Pokemon with a rugged texture and sharp, intimidating spikes.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies the essence of earth and minerals with a long body.
Design a powerful rock-type Pokemon that slithers through caves and mountains.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like a giant snake formed from rocky materials.
